movie.title: The Red Tent
movie.plot: Torn by personal guilt Italian General Umberto Nobile reminisces about his 1928 failed Arctic expedition aboard the airship Italia.
movie.awards: Nominated for 1 Golden Globe. Another 1 nomination.

events.title: Muhammad Ali hits Sonny Liston with a "phantom punch"

movie.title: Phantom Punch
movie.plot: From his discovery by a priest while serving time at the Missouri State Penitentiary to the infamous 'Phantom Punch' by Cassius Clay which effectively ended his career, the movie spans the years from 1950 to Liston's mysterious and untimely death in 1971.

movie.title: Pain & Gain
movie.plot: Daniel Lugo, manager of the Sun Gym in 1990s Miami, decides that there is only one way to achieve his version of the American dream: extortion. To achieve his goal, he recruits musclemen Paul and Adrian as accomplices. After several failed attempts, they abduct rich businessman Victor Kershaw and convince him to sign over all his assets to them. But when Kershaw makes it out alive, authorities are reluctant to believe his story.

movie.title: Invictus
movie.plot: Newly elected President Nelson Mandela knows his nation remains racially and economically divided in the wake of apartheid. Believing he can bring his people together through the universal language of sport, Mandela rallies South Africa's rugby team as they make their historic run to the 1995 Rugby World Cup Championship match.
movie.awards: Nominated for 2 Oscars. Another 12 wins & 35 nominations.

events.title: Malavath Poorna reaches the top of Mount Everest

movie.title: Poorna
movie.plot: An Adivasi 13-year-old from Telangana becomes the youngest girl in history to climb Mount Everest.

movie.title: The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy
movie.plot: Mere seconds before the Earth is to be demolished by an alien construction crew, Arthur Dent is swept off the planet by his friend Ford Prefect, a researcher penning a new edition of "The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy."
